title: Album Page, "Railing and Wall Decoration of Hospital, St. Ambrose, Milan", October 1, 1887
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, clockwise from top right corner: (inscribed in circle) 59 / 71; Wall decoration / St. Ambrosio / Milano; Hospital Railing / Milano Oct 1st 1887 (ugly); Patter of the Blazing Star.
description: Vertical sheet with three sketches. At top right is a section of wall decoration from Sant'Ambrogio, Milan.  One quadrant of a sunburst is depicted with green, pink, and yellow wavy rays emanating from the center.  To the left of this is  graphite version of the entire motif, like a pinwheel with alternating shaded arms.  Below this is a railing section with vertical members filled with squares of scrolling ironwork.
